website_summaries.verdict: SoundBuds Curve does double duty as both an excellent headset for receiving calls with its external microphone and noise isolating earbuds, and a comfy, yet rugged headset to easily survive your daily adventures.
pros: Includes a range of snug silicone and memory foam ear tips
Universally comfortable and extra-soft over-the-ear hooks
cons: Those over-the-ear hooks may take a little getting used to at first

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working just after 3 months. After a full charge, it starts and suddenly in about 5 minutes or so, it stops. No idea why this happens. I want my money back. Don't buy this product. Update: Manufacturer contacted me and sent a new one. Customer service is very good. I will update how things go with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: BKK

customer_reviews.title: Anker SoundBuds Curve is almost as good as Apple's Powerbeats 3, but costs 1/5! Exceptional value.
customer_reviews.text: My Powerbeats 3 kept on breaking, so I bought this instead. The sound quality is I would say about 4/5 as good as Powerbeats 3. The bass is a bit overpowering. However, these cost 1/5 of what Apple charges for Powerbeats 3. I must say Anker Soundbuds Curve delivers an exceptional value.
customer_reviews.author: Pete from California

customer_reviews.title: I am always fan of Anker products...but this product has issues with mic
customer_reviews.text: I am always fan of Anker products, their customer services are very helpful, responsive, and cooperative. But this product has issues with its mic. The 1st one encountered a problem; people can barley hear me, Anker sent me another one, which worked greatly well. Couple days ago the mic went totally off and people can’t hear me at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ozaq

customer_reviews.title: Hardware doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: The sound and battery are great, especially for its price. However... its price shows in how long the headsets actually last. I'm extremely careful with my electronics. I woke up one morning and the glued-in part of the earpiece had detached. They've never been so much as put in a bag before-- I've treated these guys with fragile care and they still only lasted about six months.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Do not last
customer_reviews.text: In short, these just do not last. I use these at work so I can work hands free, and I use them at the gym. They get 5-8hrs of use a week. The first pair quit charging after about 12 months. Anker replaced them without issue in January of 2019. The new headphones have failed already. They will not turn on, and at the end would sporadically charge when they felt like it. Anker responded to an email earlier this week stating they are out of warranty at this point and will not replace. The sound quality was great, and I overall really liked them. Just too many issues with them constantly not working.
customer_reviews.author: LSSI

customer_reviews.title: Battery is good, but sound is not.
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I liked the product for its extended battery life. It was easy to handle it. But with the passage of time, I found some problems with it. Its sound quality was affecting my eardrums due to which I decided to buy another bigger headphone. Secondly, When I would be talking to someone on phone, its mic would catch the sound in the external environment and the other guy whom I would be speaking with would not listen to my voice, but he would clearly listen to people talking near me. It was weird. I do not know if this would be problem in other similar products too.
customer_reviews.author: Rizwanov

customer_reviews.title: For the price these are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I got these for Christmas and have used them fairly heavily since then. Pros: - they actually stay on my ears - work well - included controls on the wire for volume - includes different ear pieces - included carrying case - recharge ability - great battery life - about 12-17 hours until I have to charge. Cons: - still “wired” - drops out a few times for a second. - a bit bulky - not top notch sound quality The price on these headphones was amazing and I would highly recommend them, but you must know the drawbacks. For the price these can’t be beat!
customer_reviews.author: Goodie

customer_reviews.title: Only ANC Earpiece you'll need
customer_reviews.text: This is a great ANC earpiece with extras that would cost so much on major brands. I purchased for my wife and she loves it. The ANC really worked coz when I talk to her she can't hear me while wearing it coming from her walks. She said the quality of the sound is like any other fancy brand but in a cheaper price. Plus, you've got great battery life of 18 HRS. I've been buying Anker products and they don't disappoint. I'd like to get this for myself now. I recommend this to anyone looking for great quality in a ANC earpiece. It's everything you need in a quality earpiece. Fantastic Anker product!
customer_reviews.author: Syd S.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds horrible, no mic for calls, and won’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: I bought these after a lot of research stating they were best bargains in wireless earbuds. I would give these zero stars on quality and fit if I could. They don’t fit IN my ear, won’t stay on my left ear (especially if I try to run), don’t come with adjustable ear pieces, and no matter what you do the sound quality is underwater in a tunnel. And, when I tried to make phone calls using them, no one could understand me at all. And the sync to iPhone is a pain. Going to try to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Paige Stone

customer_reviews.title: I had two of these ... both died in less than a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in Sept 2018. Less than a year later, the first one died and was replaced under warranty. Just the other week, the second one died. Both fail to power up now. I don't quite understand why they die so fast. The last one just cutting out on my last run, then started making a bizarre buzzing noise. I took it home, put it on the charger, and saw that it was charging. But, it never started up after that. I actually like the audio quality, fit, and overall performance of this ear bud. But, I've had much better luck with longevity from the Otium brand of wireless ear buds. They seem to last a year before dying.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Review by an Anker FanBoy
customer_reviews.text: I have been so impressed with all of the Anker products I have purchased. All of them have been high quality with outstanding value. These wireless earbuds are no exception. I use them every morning while road cycling. They provide amazing sound quality and dependability. Always connect on the first attempt and stay connected. The sound is awesome. Yes, they can be a little heavy handed with the bass. And the mids and highs sound clear and tight. I listen to a set of bowers & Wilkins at my desktop. So that is my point of reference for hifi sound. Highly recommended. Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have loved these since I got them a couple of years ago, but never wrote a review. They are great for working from home to cut down the background noise during video meetings. I ended up losing one of my earbuds tips, and had also lost the spare ones.. I wrote Anker and they were kind enough to dig up some in the warehouse and ship to me for $6. That saved me having to buy a whole new product. Their customer service is as outstanding as their products, of which I have many including cables, chargers and portable chargers as well as a few sets of Bluetooth headsets. You won't be disappointed with anything you purchase from Anker.
customer_reviews.author: 62NVON

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I order these back in Sept. after about 4 months 1 of the ear buds stopped working. I placed a call in Feb about this. I took a picture & sent it to the company & I in turn received an email stating that I would get a replacement 3-5 days. I sent an email this past Sunday Mar. 8th & I was told I that they had to manually put the order through & that I would receive an email with 24 hours with a tracking number. I have yet to receive the email with the tracking number. If the item can't be replaced I just wish they would tell you instead I feel I'm getting the run around.
customer_reviews.author: E. Ransom

customer_reviews.title: Decent Battery, Bad Connection
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a pair of decent sports headphones and loved the idea of the advertised battery time of 14 hours before requiring a recharge. I tested them out several times because with two other pairs, I experienced interruptions. The sound would randomly be interrupted or stop altogether for several seconds. Not idea when running in noisy environments, which is an unfortunate characteristic of most gyms. Also, the battery is longer than the other pairs of bluetooth headphones I've owned, but not the advertised 14 hours, maybe 8, if I am being generous. Returning pair because continuous sound quality is a requisite of any pair of bluetooth sports headphones.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: I had two pairs and they both died. Yes both of them.
customer_reviews.text: I got my first pair and they died while I was running. I thought it was strange the battery didn’t last longer but then when I plugged it in nothing happened, they were completely dead. They sent me out new ones but those died after the same amount of time which was about 3 weeks of sparadic use and nothing I did could make them work again. So I received 2 pairs of these and they both died after 3 weeks of use and when I say died I mean dead as a door nail.
customer_reviews.author: Sticks

customer_reviews.title: The best earbuds ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: From first look, just after unpacking it looked like a stalish product. I started to run few months ago and looked for earbuds to escort me during the activities. Well...I charged it for 20 m and it is fully charged. Wear it....surprise!!!! Super convenient to wear. Adjust itself perfect!! Started it and easily and smusly paired it to my phone. Few minutes and it was ready. And.... second surprise came. This are amazing airbuds perfect sound , better then other i aquired for 150 EUR. No kidding these sounds much better. I fell in love with the earbuds and they are on me at all time. Dire straight never sound better.
customer_reviews.author: Doron R.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Like many other reviewers I have had good luck with Anker products but these headphones have one issue that makes these headphones deserve an OK rating. The battery life is terrible. The description claims 12 hours of music listening but I am lucky if I can get 4 hours when these were brand new. Bought these in April and now I am lucky to get 2 hours of listening to music. Sound is great, controls are adequate but the battery life is not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first generation of these around 2 years ago and absolutely loved them! recently the right earbud decided to break into two pieces. I used these at the gym, snow shoveling, landscaping, everywhere. My guess is the cold to hot temperature changes caused them to loose integrity over time and then one sudden shock (dropping them down onto a table) finished them off. The sound was great, bass was surprisingly full, and the battery was solid. The only "flaw" is the volume rocker on the earbud cable would weigh itself down, causing the cable to drop to the right side, this was annoying when running but the included earbud cable holder helped.
customer_reviews.author: Homesteader

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working but immediately replaced
customer_reviews.text: These are an excellent value. I use them for running and they sound great and they stay in my ear throughout my run. They're the best running headphones ive ever used, which is why I was really disappointed when one day in the middle of a run they just shut off and wouldn't turn back on. I tried charging them and they still wouldn't work. After using them maybe 15 times, they were dead. I contacted Anker and 2 days later my replacement pair arrived. Replacement procedure was very simple. I hope this new pair isn't defective but im confident in Anker's warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Well, Great seller Great item EDITED!
customer_reviews.text: EDIT: THIS COMPANY OFFERS EXCELLENT CUSTOMER SEEVICE. they reached out to me over my issue and completely destroyed my preconceived notions and surpassed my expectations. I'm a customer for life. old review... .These are pretty decent for the money but the piece I'm missing is important and the company wants me to jump through hoops to get a piece of foam so small it can't even be valued mailed to me...
customer_reviews.author: Cigarhead

customer_reviews.title: Great buds!
customer_reviews.text: I use these for travel entertainment. On a recent trip I couldn't get the volume up, wrote Anker and received a troubleshooting list. Anker was willing to set up a warranty claim if those steps weren't successful. Turns I wasn't using the buttons correctly and couldn't find out how to increase the volume (even online) until I found the original paperwork. Still very happy with my purchase and Anker's customer service. I don't push them into my ears all the way (ultra-sensitive ears) so I cannot say they are sound deadening. I've never used them until they die; I charge them when I'm done.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Diller

customer_reviews.title: Good price to Performance
customer_reviews.text: I've really enjoyed these headphones. For the price, it's hard to beat. They sound good, I've never had connectivity issues, and I've enjoyed using them when running. My only problem was that a wire on the inside got disconnected so one side would cut in and out, be loud then quiet. They lasted about 8 months which is good for me since I would use them about 8 hours each day.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Strongly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.text: Best customer service on Amazon! They helped me out with the defective pair I had and now these new ones work perfect. They sound great and the battery life is out of this world for the price. Strongly recommended these to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Alberto

customer_reviews.title: Important feature missing!
customer_reviews.text: Headphones sound quality is probably one of the best for the price range (under 30$). Sound curve leans slightly heavy on the bass for buds, but doesn't distort. The hooks are maliable rubber and are quite comfortable. I could wear for several hours and workout without fatigue. Ear wigs didn't quite help since they're all too short. However, what I received doesn't match the pictures. My case has no clip, and no carabiner. I was going to clip this to my Molly straps on all of my bags but I can't.
customer_reviews.author: Jambat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Considering how much these cost, I'm absolutely blown away by the sound quality. It's powerful and got plenty of volume for my liking, but not tinny at all. I work in an office/warehouse environment and I expect they will do perfectly in drowning out the sounds of work and coworkers around me. The fitment is the best I've ever had in a pair of ear buds. I can't speak as to the battery life just yet, but I will update in the future. 10/10 would recommend if you just want some solid ear buds for not a whole lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: iratSkirT

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself the hassle and buy something else
customer_reviews.text: I used these headphones 4 times before they died. First two times were fine. The third time I used them the headphones worked fine for about 45 minutes, then skipped back to the beginning of a music track, played for another 5-10 minutes and then died (didn't respond to button presses, didn't make sound, but my phone thought they were still connected). The next time I used them two days later, they connected just fine but the same thing happened again at about the 45 minute mark, except this time they never turned on again and appear completely dead.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choppy BT connectivity; Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty solid for 30$. The only issue I have is the BT transmitter can lose connectivity easily. I get choppy response when the transmitter is blocked in anyway, such as when my hand is wrapped around the controller adjusting volume or using other buttons. Turns out I had a previous set, Anker reached out and offered me a free replacement set! The new set works great and the bluetooth connectivity is muuuuch better. Unfortunately, My GF stole the headphones lol, so I will be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Miskell

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I'm no audiophile, but I think these sound great. They are a bit bass heavy, but I kinda like it. Battery life lasts for probably 10 hours or so. I don't use these to call/receive calls. Customer service is amazing. About 10 months after buying these, one of the eartips (including the part that actually produces sound) completely popped off. The internal metal wire connecting the eartip speaker to the the earpiece completely broke. I filed a warranty request and Anker approved it and sent me a brand new replacement within a couple days, for free.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: What Noise Cancellation?
customer_reviews.text: As wireless earphones, these have decent volume and stay in place at the gym. They pair easily and hold a charge. I would say the sound quality is... fine. The overall volume seems low, even when cranked up. However, the noise cancellation feature is dubious at best. There's no active mode for it listed in the instructions, so you'd assume it's just "on" all the time, but when wearing these I hear MORE noise from my surroundings than I do with my generic over-ear headphones that don't even advertise or HAVE noise cancellation. Meh.
customer_reviews.author: LDC

customer_reviews.title: Great Value from product to customer service
customer_reviews.text: At first I was skeptical of this product because of its price range. As with many other reviews, I was pleasantly surprised. It comes with a case, several ear tips and hooks, and usb cable for charging. However, after 9 months, my earphones would no longer power on. I emailed Anker and they gave me some common troubleshooting steps. After that failed, they requested a few documents as proof of purchase and a replacement was sent out to me immediately. Apparently, their warranty is for 18 months. From the day I contacted them to the day I got my replacement took roughly a week. (Shelly, you were an absolute ease and pleasure to work with to get my replacement).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound, Good Fit, Weird "Thump on impact
customer_reviews.text: I think these headphones sound great, and work great at the value they are at. However, I have one qualm with it. I've never really liked the heavy "sealing" feeling that headphones with this shape tend to give. The noise "cancellation" feature is great, but when making impact on the ground when running, walking, jogging, etc. There is a noticeable and distracting bass-y thump which I presume is due to the "sealing" of the earbuds within the ear. I would recommend these to anyone conscious of a budget or someone who doesn't mind the ear sealing vacuum that these in ear shapes bring to the table, but I didn't find them very comfortable or resistant to impact sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Jarren Crist

customer_reviews.title: Love them.. and still love them on 2 review!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my LGs that finally gave out.. For the price at 17.00 bucks after the rebate and sale price... I can't complain. Sound is good and no distortion when they are set to Max.. I would recommend them to anyone looking to get a quality pair of wireless Bluetooth ear phones.. 2nd review... Definitely the best pair of head sets I have had!!.. I just returned my Soundcore Spirits due to technical issues with them ( shutting off, disconnecting randomly before a call is made and shutting off at 60 % charge with no warning)... I have had Zero issue with these Anker Sound buds Curves!!! I highly recommend them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great bass and battery life!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the price! The bass is great, so much so that I no longer like using my other headphones that I used to think were good! I got these for skating without having any cables getting in the way. I swear quite a lot during a session and these have been holding up really well! Battery life is exceptional, I’ve gone 2 weeks without having to charge them! My one star off is due to the connection breaking off whenever I bend forward to tie my skates or if I don’t have my phone in my pocket.
customer_reviews.author: The Browns

customer_reviews.title: i have had 3 pairs
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality- For the most part sound is alright but i would like a greater max volume for certain podcasts I listen to. Material- If you don't want to lose your earbuds you will most likely have to super glue them on. The rest of the material is very comfortable to wear. These earphones will not break apart from casual usage like other earphones. battery life- is completely accurate throughout the lifetime of the earphones for everyone I've had. ive had 1 crushed (due to my job), 1 gifted, and 1 data corrupted and wont sync anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Medellin

customer_reviews.title: These are quite good!
customer_reviews.text: These are my very first bluetooth earbuds. For the price I figured I'd give them a try after seeing some good reviews. They come with several differently sized buds which is great. I have smaller ears and the smallest buds fit perfectly. The sound quality is amazing. I've worn them during my work commute and also to the gym. I'm getting a 2nd set to have one in my work bag and the other in my gym bag. I haven't fully tested the battery life yet but so far not seeing any issues. The cord is probably the only negative. It's a little flimsy. But for the cost these were well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: M. Sims

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these as one of my Christmas gifts for two teens and my boyfriend. One of them is not working at all, not even the charging light is coming on and the other two are starting to give trouble. I love and believe in this brand so much I recommend it to everyone I know but for the first time I can honestly say I am truly disappointed in one of your products. The year is not even out and they don't have properly working headphones and I am out of nearly $75.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not work!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't matter if you have good battery life or good noise cancellation when the headphones don't stay connected. I have tried disconnecting and reconnecting from uninstalling to reinstalling, yet they do not hold connection during phone calls or whether just listening to music on my computer. They work for approx. five mins. or so and every time, they cut out and stop working; I get no sound from the headphones. This is a terrible product even though not super expensive. If I can't use them, what's the point?
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds and customer support
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these earbuds 8 months ago and my husband loves using them for the gym and even to take calls when necessary. They worked beautifully and then stopped taking a charge. We contacted customer support via email to see if we had any options. I was happily surprised that they stand by their product. After providing our purchase details and serial number, they sent out a replacement pair of earbuds to us within days. I can't remember the last time I had such good service from a company I contacted regarding a product that stopped working. These earbuds are worth every penny and sold by a company that respects their customers time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Mom in CT

customer_reviews.title: as when I first used them they sounded pretty bad. Now I'd rate the sound quality as ...
customer_reviews.text: These headphones do need a little break-in time, as when I first used them they sounded pretty bad. Now I'd rate the sound quality as simply OK. For the gym that's adequate. I'm really glad they come with a variety of ear-plugs as the default ones didn't work at all; I ended up needing the smallest ones, and now they fit perfectly and stay in place. Battery life is very good; so far I've used them for about 4 hours total and still around 80%. I've purchased Anker cables and power packs and have been happy with them, so I was glad to discover they made these soundbuds. Would love to see a higher-end over-ear set of headphones from them!
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Pros and Cons
customer_reviews.text: Okay, it is not as good as it's predecessor which died on me after 25 months, but it does the job. Had an excellent battery life and is inexpensive. On the minus side, two things: one or does not synchronize with the phone's volume bar and two, it does not support aptx like the previous model. However it does support AAC so apple users will appreciate that. Fortunately AAC is also supported by my s10e so not a big difference from aptX. Good choice for the price
customer_reviews.author: Qwerty1gr

customer_reviews.title: Great for flights, blocks baby noise out!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable in my ears. Does not fall out, even when resting head on a travel pillow in the airplane. Did a very good job on two flights where I had a baby in a row next to me on each flight. It cut out a lot of background noise and with the headphones on the highest settings, it almost eliminated the baby crying, except at quiet parts between tracks or when the music is very very soft. Very pleased with the purchase. As other reviewers said, only minor complaint would be placement of the controls, but my problem comes being left handed, and the controls are on the right.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: First impressions
customer_reviews.text: I just got these to replace a different pare from another company. So far I love that they come in a box that is wrapped in plastic so that I know they are new. In the box you get everything you would need. They have a charger, a carrying case, and different ear pieces to fit your needs. I tried making a call and it was wonderful. I have not listened to a movie or any music because I have not had the chance to yet but once I have I will update the review. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Rachiz

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Junk. I am on my second pair of these and this pair ended with the same exact problem as the first. The first pair lasted about 1 month. They would no longer turn on even though they were fully charged. They were only used for running a few times a week indoors on a treadmill. I thought maybe it was a fluke since they seemed to be well made and sounded good, so I decided to just go ahead and buy a second pair considering the low price. After 2 weeks now, this second pair, just like the first, will no longer turn on with what I consider light use. Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: FireDawg

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working Within 6 Months
customer_reviews.text: I didn't expect much out of bluetooth headphones that were less than $25, but I was disappointed still when they stopped turning on less than 6 months after my purchase. When they were working, the sound quality was fine as long as I kept my phone in the pocket on the same side of my body as the receiver (sound cuts out when a body is in the way). Like some other reviews have mentioned, the inline remote smacks me on the neck while running. I've reached out to the manufacturer to see if they can fix the issue, in which case I'll update my review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for use with my cell phone!
customer_reviews.text: I have an older car so I can't use my phone other than on speaker and that sometimes doesn't work. I used a holder on my vent, but would have to tell for the other person to hear me. I decided to get these earbuds to use my phone while driving. The sound is great and I can speak normally and my voice comes over loud and clear. I don't place the earbuds in my ear all the way so I can hear noises around me. If they are all the way in, they do block outside noise very well
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Are these of alien technology?????
customer_reviews.text: These chumpies are a steal for the price and the 18 month warranty. Best of all is that the sound truly is superior to most more expensive competitors on amazon. The bass is much lower and fuller. Sure, they are not the sexiest earbuds but damn it the sound provides such an enjoyable experience and the batteries never seem to die. I am certain these were sent down to earth via tractor beam from a mothership of some distant world.
customer_reviews.author: Shaffer American Property

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price, but bulky
customer_reviews.text: I like these earbuds, but I often find myself still resorting to my wired set of buds since these are quite bulky. So, for plane/car/home use it would be ok, but for folks who like to take thier earbuds most places they go, they aren't very discreet. As an example, I'm not a big fan of walking around the mall, but I'm in a relationship with someone who does like that, so I'll listen to an audio book while walking around. I found myself putting these away as they stand out quite a bit and need to be clipped to keep from constantly sagging to know side when not in your ear.
customer_reviews.author: W. West

customer_reviews.title: So far so so so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving these! I was going to get a pair of beats 3 because my daughter got them for free while getting a new macbook. After listening to those I realized that I am missing out on quality earbuds .But they are $200..very expensive! So I decided to take a chance on these since the ratings are so great and I have owned may external batteries by anker and I know their products are quality. Also, Anker has excellent customer service. So far...LOVING these. The sound is great and it easily connected to my phone. The true test will be after a run with these, but so far soo sooo good!
customer_reviews.author: Alissaspieces

customer_reviews.title: Not IPX7 rated as claimed
customer_reviews.text: 3rd pair purchased. Fits well, sounds good, no problems pairing. However, they are not up to the IPX7 rating advertised. Why are they my 3rd pair? Because the first two (and now this pair) have died after use in a light rain (not getting soaked, actually had a hood on to help protect these delicate pieces of shit the last time around). I had been buying these because they were pretty cheap, and I didn't feel too bad about throwing them away every 9 months. This last pair didn't last 3 months. Recommend that they stay absolutely dry, or you spend your money on a nicer product.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: I wear these when on my motorcycle. They stay in at speed and sound good. No issues when its raining. comfortable and easy to use. Only thing I want to see better is the range. I cant put these in then go cut the grass without the phone being in my pocket which is not good for the phone. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work with WIndows 10
customer_reviews.text: I spent hours trying to get these to work on several different Windows 10 computers - changing bluetooth drivers, trying different computers, trying different settings, etc.. They would sort of work for a minute and then fizzle out. I tested them on an Android phone and they seemed to work fine. Contacted Anker, and they say they are "incompatible with my device" which I guess is Windows 10. Disappointing as they fit really well, and are exactly what I was looking for in their overall construction and design, but I need them for working on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Sheldon Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for office use. Not great when moving around a lot.
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, the battery life is phenomenal on these. Secondly, the sound is quite good, especially for the cost. However, these headphones are not ideal for more active pursuits based on their design. For fairly stationary work or walking, they shine. When kept sealed to your ears, these sound quite good yet are open enough to hear coworkers and your environment. The downside is that the ear tips lose their seal if you move around and sound quality suffers significantly. So if you plan to use these in a mostly stationary environment, they're an excellent buy. But for active usage, I would look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer T.

customer_reviews.title: Not as good on Day 2 - Amended
customer_reviews.text: Anker is always my go-to for tech products, so when I wanted Bluetooth workout headphones, I perused their products and bought these. Out of the box, I was thrilled. I was able to walk 20 ft from my phone, and the music was loud. I was thrilled. Day 2 had a noticeable decrease in volume and the Bluetooth kicks in and out in my pocket. It is what it is, and they were not a lot of money, but I’m bummed I got my hopes up when I first opened them. Update: my iPhone’s mother board has crashed. This was the reason for the lack of Connectivity. Apologies to Anker. Sound still isn’t great, but amazing value.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonan F. Mokriski

customer_reviews.title: The price makes them a steal.
customer_reviews.text: Stellar headphones for the price. They aren't as loud as other earbuds I've had, but the sound quality is very solid. They're not for bass heads; however, they produce even sound. I haven't pushed the battery to its limit, so I can't speak on that. Nevertheless, I'd recommend these to anyone looking for bluetooth earbuds below the $40 to $50 range. Phone call quality has been good on my end, and I was told that I sounded better and more clear than my previous Sony earbuds that were wired. They're a great bargain!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Bluetooth Headphones in the History of Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: The greatest Bluetooth Headphones in the history of Bluetooth. After my last sub $30 bluetooth headphone purchase (where the sound cuts out every 5 seconds), I was not hopeful this would be better. But after all the great reviews, I decided that enough years had passed since my last bluetooth headphone purchase that maybe the standard had improved enough to be usable without spending $150 on a pair of headphones. This product exceeds all reasonable expectations for what a sub $30 pair of BT headphones can do. I'm ranting and raving to everyone that will listen about how amazing these headphones are.
customer_reviews.author: Fancy Bear

customer_reviews.title: Did not last even half a year
customer_reviews.text: It has been 4 months since I bought this pair. I use it at the gym at least 4 times a week. It was great untill the right side stoped working. Now I have to buy a new pair. If the point of selling at a low price is that you have to re-buy maybe you should spend on something more expensive and save yourself the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Go-To Bluetooth Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: It's easy to draw one's self into the higher-price, Bluetooth earbuds, thinking the quality and sustainability exceeds those with lesser name recognition or for less the price. But with the Anker earbuds, I've found my absolute favorite earbuds and for under $30. The first pair I bought lasted over three years, and I'm going over a year strong on my current pair. The cord is the right size without being cumbersome, and the volume/pause buttons are easy to reach. A great product at an even greater price!
customer_reviews.author: JTH

customer_reviews.title: Does not last long
customer_reviews.text: After using the soundbuds curve happily for half a year (bought it November 2019), the sound from the left speaker became very quiet. I played with setting balance on the headset, to no avail. Clearly the cable is okay, the speaker itself must have died somehow? Anyway, for the price, I do not expect the headset to last forever, so I guess half a year of life is not too bad? Still a bit disappointed as I liked the headset otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. I was worried about "around the ear" arms, but they aren't terrible at all like the ones that hurt your ears. Bluetooth was easy to connect to my phone and work computer. Not sure if these have a microphone, but if it did, it would be worth buying a set for my home. If I were to change anything, it would be to reduce the size of the section that has the company logo. It's not overly huge or anything, it's more conspicuous.
customer_reviews.author: Ean P.

customer_reviews.title: Don't work anymore in less than a month
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: After contact Anker Support, they kindly replace the SoundBuds, and the new ones works great, I've used daily since I receive and works great. Amazing support and customer service. ORIGINAL COMMENT: This is the first time that any Anker product fail me, I bought this for listen music while ride bike, after only 6 uses (3 hours per use) in less than a month don't work anymore, don't charge, don't turn on, don't do nothing, very disappointed of been spend my money on these.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Voice through microphone inaudible :(
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I am extremely impressed with the lowest bass reproduction. The sound is very good overall, unbeatable for the price. The headphones are comfortable and the the battery is great. Unfortunately all of this is killed by the absolutely subpar microphone experience. I am not sure if it’s only my unit but there is a high pitched sound the entire time a voice is recorded or during a phone call. It makes the voice pretty much inaudible. I am extremely disappointed as this would be otherwise a brilliant product. Anyone has the same experience or do I just have a faulty unit
customer_reviews.author: Adba M.

customer_reviews.title: Anker Soundbuds
customer_reviews.text: These are great, especially for the price. The sound quality is good although I will very occasionally pick up a very small amount of interference. That is not a big deal for me and does not affect my opinion of their overall performance. The battery life is also very good. I'm super happy with them and highly recommend, especially if you just don't need anything really fancy and high-end. I was looking for practical and functional but low-cost and these fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: tigersroar

customer_reviews.title: They are “that good”
customer_reviews.text: Work great and stay placed well. I lost one pair when I dropped it while mowing (my fault. They wife got my attention so I took them out of my ears and hung them around my neck. After she was done talking to me I continued mowing without putting them back in my ears. They fell and I mowed over them) that being said, I order another pair the very same day as they were “that good”
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Sounds good and long battery life
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I got these. Honestly Anker has NEVER let me down once! I have bought so many products from them. These sound good and the battery life is amazing. I've used them running with no problems. Sometimes when I connect them to my Macbook pro I have to make sure no audio is playing before I connect the bluetooth. Could just be on my end but other than that these are comfortable and sound great! Probably my go to headphones for now on.
customer_reviews.author: C. Blake

customer_reviews.title: ... for the price but given Anker has always made great products I gave them a shot
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on buying these for the price but given Anker has always made great products I gave them a shot. I’m extremely active at work and also workout daily and these are the best speakers I’ve had! They hang on good with the over ear clips and readjustments are hardly needed. I rated these four stars as I wish the speaker quality was a little better but it’s great for the price. The volume control is a little bulky as well. I will definitely purchase another set to have on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are a great budget option for bluetooth headphones. They offer a super clear sound, though it does not get particularly loud. Pairing is quick and has the capability to link to multiple devices. The big reason I am giving this product 5 stars is due to the efficiency and ease of the customer service I received. One of my earbuds suddenly cut out and the customer service team responded to my email within 24 hours and shipped me a brand new pair within 4 days. It was absolutely painless and Joy was really kind, thoughtful and (most importantly) responsive throughout the process.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality around the ear headphones!
customer_reviews.text: First time giving Anker a try on headphones and I was not disappointed. These are high quality headphones, I was afraid that they would be uncomfortable because I wear eyeglasses. These are not uncomfortable at all, I especially like the clip in the back because it keeps them sturdy around my head. The base is superb, not too heavy like the Beats and the different ear buds are easy to replace. These headphones were easy to sync to all my Bluetooth devices. I truly loved them that I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: ZTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Last all day
customer_reviews.text: I just ordered my 3rd set of these very headphones, Soundbuds Curve. I had several Soundbuds Slim, but wanted a longer battery life, and these were just the ticket. 3rd set because I ripped the ear off the first set in 3 months, and the second set just started acting up after 15months of constant use. I am network and alarm installation technician and I wear these all day, listening to Audible or Pandora. They work well in most environments, meaning either 20ft up a ladder in the wind or crawling through basements, they stay put and keep working all day. I have been very please with them, and will probably buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jay from Upstate

customer_reviews.title: Just Purchase Them !
customer_reviews.text: They look like quality headphones and come with a very convenient zipper hardcase carrier with extra replacement rubber pieces. Plus the USB cord. The sound is clear and noise canceling at a mid volume on my phone. Easy to connect. I just received them so havent tested the battery life but I can tell you they feel so secure and comfortable on. For this price you can't go wrong. Also the return window is a nice bonus incase they dont work out.
customer_reviews.author: Celina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but at least they get the job done
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, I expected a bit more from Anker with their SoundBuds Curve. The sound is pretty poor quality but that’s to be expected at this price point. The most frustrating thing and the reason for the three stars is the fact that the Bluetooth connection cuts in and out as soon as I put my phone in my left pants pocket. ** Updated on 11/28/2017 ** I was contacted by Anker customer support who assured me that I received a faulty unit. They expressed me out a new pair and I've been happy since. Thank you, Anker, for standing behind your product!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Brunner

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones I've had in a long time-possibly ever. They are so comfortable I forget I'm wearing them, and the sound quality is fantastic. I love the assortment of earbuds they come with to ensure you have a fit that is comfortable, regardless of ear size. The battery life is pretty good(12.5 hrs) and takes very little time to fully charge. I occasionally have some gaps in my connection, causing a very brief skip when I'm listening to music, but this might be due to my phone. Overall, they are fantastic headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Tawni B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product - Even Better Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: Best workout headphones for the price! The fit is awesome and secure, volume gets pretty loud, and battery life has been outstanding. There was a slight hiccup when I upgraded phones and my headphones wouldn't connect. I reached out to Anker support and got a response very quickly. They told me they were actively working on a solution and followed up accordingly without me ever asking again. A new software update fixed my issue and I'm back to enjoying my headphones again. The product is great, and it's even better knowing it's from a company who treats its customers the right way.
customer_reviews.author: Techkid92

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these because they were inexpensive. I am not going to use the word cheap, but cause they appear to be well made. However, if you are looking for audio quality you should get something else. They work great for phone calls, everything is very clear, but if you are getting these to listen to music you will be disappointed by the sound quality. In my opinion it is a little worse that FM radio. The other issue I had is the length of the cable. I have a large neck, it is was a little short for me.
customer_reviews.author: JTChance

customer_reviews.title: Act now and get some bonus earwax!
customer_reviews.text: Caution: May not be a new product. Just received my order and it was obviously a open box return. The seal to the box was cut, the headphones were tangled in the case and for a added bonus there was some earwax on one ear piece! Hit that baby with the Clorox wipe immediately! Oh, and the charging wire was loose, no tie to keep it neat. How do I know this is not standard, aside from the nasty earwax? This is my second pair. My first was unfortunately stolen from my hotel last month, but like the battery life so decided to order a replacement pair. Second guessing that decision now...
customer_reviews.author: Douglass W.

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these headphones to wear while I workout both running and cycling. They fit great, the sound is amazing, and I barely notice them when I am wearing them. After a couple weeks they did stop working. I sent an email into customer service and heard back quickly. We tried troubleshooting and it seems I got a bad pair. They sent me a new pair, no questions asked, and they have been working flawlessly ever since. Very happy with these headphones and the impeccable customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Really great headphones for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a cheap pair of BT headphones for the gym to replace by Powerbeats until I could pony up the money for another pair of high end headphones. So far I'm actually liking these BETTER than my Beats. They sound every bit as good IMO with heavy bass, and crisp sound quality. They actually fit me better as well. I've owned headphones by Jaybird and Beats.... if we did a blind test on all of the I'd put these in that same class. We'll see how long they last, but right now I'm very pleased with these. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Cowey

customer_reviews.title: Sound is far from perfect, let's say even sound is awful. But really comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: Maybe because of noise cancelling sound is quite weird. It sounds like it came from inside of a tin can. Basses are indistinct and loud, but lost any details in midbass. APTX is not marked anywhere on package, not in the manual. Looks like it's only Chinese fake. On the bright side - it's really comfortable while running. All that hooks and ear-tips keeps it in my ears very secure. It is most comfortable fit that I ever had for sport headsets UPDATE: Checked it with Oreo developer settings - yes it supports APTX. Another note: battery life is perfect. 3rd workout during this week and battery is still "high", according to Android info,
customer_reviews.author: Sergey

customer_reviews.title: Not What I Was Expecting
customer_reviews.text: Things I like: Battery life is great Comfort is good Easy pairing Cons: Sound is very tinny (for me) Almost zero bass on my set I’m not sure I could recommend these based on volume issues and lack of bass. ********************************** I wanted to amend my review and raise the rating on the headsets, only because Anker reached out to me and worked out a solution to my problem. Anker’s customer service deserves a 10-star rating! Others haven’t had the problem I had so I’m assuming I just had bad luck with mine. One thing for sure, Anker’s customer service is the best I’ve ever dealt with!
customer_reviews.author: gms238

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. I know there are others. Dont take a chance.
customer_reviews.text: I am truly shocked. 50 times better than what i expected. Yes, i only paid 20 because of black friday but well worth the original price. I am a huge anker fan. I only buy their power banks. This product has good range too. About 30 feet. Not bad. Still works around 50 feet but gets crackly. Buy these. They will not fall out of ear. They seem sweat proof. Extremely comfortable. AWESOME.
customer_reviews.author: truth sayer

customer_reviews.title: Good while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: These lasted almost 6 months before one of speakers came off completely and the wires broke from it. I attempted to fix it but wasn't able to so now only one side works. I used them mostly while I was in the gym and also during my jogs and they held in place fine. I've bought many different products from Anker (usb portable chargers, usb cables, usb car chargers) and this is my first negative experience with any of their products. I'm tempted to buy them again because I did like them while they lasted but I might shop around for a cheaper alternative if 6 months is all I will end up getting out of bluetooth earbuds.
customer_reviews.author: Steve D

customer_reviews.title: Great Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I lost my Bose SoundSport Wireless earbuds after having them about a month and I was NOT going to spend that much money on another pair, so I did my research and decided to give these a try. These Anker soundbuds have been an excellent replacement. The sound quality is perfect, the multiple adjustable earpieces customize to my different sized ear canals perfectly and the battery last a long time. I'm very pleased with my purchase as I have been on all Anker products I've purchased. Another home run Anker!
customer_reviews.author: Roy Foster

customer_reviews.title: pros and cons
customer_reviews.text: this product has clear pros and cons after using it for several months. first of all, my usage is very light. I only use it <15 times in the last 8 month (charged the battery about 3-4 times total). So luckily the set still works after more than half a year as well as when it was brand new. No issue of it stopping working so far. Like a lot of other reviews mentioned, battery life is superb. sound quality is not bad. now comes the cons: it is sooooo difficult to connect it via bluetooth!!! so difficult that it become a battle for each use -- that's exactly why it has been used so lightly!!!.
customer_reviews.author: Yiyi Wu

customer_reviews.title: Work well most of the time, but lately has lots of crackling and stuttering
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to work better when I initially received them and have been degrading over time. I now experience crackling and stuttering even when my phone is right next to them. Other than that the sound quality and range of volume and frequencies is good. They seem well made with good material quality, but the cord and remote position can be a little annoying when it swings back and forth against your neck. The battery life is great and they recharge quickly. This is my own fault, but I often leave them on overnight after listening to books in bed and wake up to a drained battery. So make sure to turn them off when not in use!
customer_reviews.author: Madeleine McBain

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of wireless earbuds to wear while running that would actually stay in. But I also wanted them to not break the bank but sound good and have great battery life. These headphones check all of those boxes! I was really surprised at how well they sound. I'm no audiophile but I am really into audio and know what sounds good and what does not. The sound is well balanced. They also hold their charge well. I would highly recommend these. There's no way you can go wrong with these, especially for the price. After a few wears I haven't noticed any connection issues either.
customer_reviews.author: Luke F.

customer_reviews.title: Update: Stopped Charging
customer_reviews.text: After the second time I charged the set, it worked for 45 min and died. Won't charge anymore. Tried multiple charges and wires but nothing. Waste of money. Update: emailed the customer service and their response was great and they sent me a new pair to try again. They have followed up several times to see how things are going. I am not sure if they new one will work for long and I will update this review but I can say that their customer service was impeccable. Kudos to that team!
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, but bad range
customer_reviews.text: Sounds quality is great. I got them for work to replace an old pair of broken headphones. Getting it working on PC required some work, but found a 3rd party solution (BTW_12.0.1.940_win8_10_x64). The thing that keeps it from getting 5 stars is the range is very poor. I am about 3 feet from my computer and it get occasional pops when signal is dropped. however if i move to 5-6 feet, i loose 30-50% of the audio. 10 ft, and the are completely un-usable
customer_reviews.author: D. Diekmann

customer_reviews.title: Ehh, pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that they are blue tooth. I bought these hoping they would solve my problem of having headphones fall out while I run, but the curve part is quite large and not adjustable. I am female with medium/average sized ears and these feel huge on me. I really wish they were adjustable. Sound quality is good. Battery life is okay. During a 30 min run, the battery dropped from 40% to 0%. I purchased them in February 2019 and they Died July 2019. Incredibly disappointed. I've never had headphones die in less than 1 year. I will never buy another Anker product again.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Harris

customer_reviews.title: Amazing customer service
customer_reviews.text: For a while this was not compatible with the new iPhone, but I think that may have been corrected. I would just like to leave a review to say how great Anker customer service is. When the headphones were not compatible with my new iphone, they immediately sent me out a replacement with a similar model. No questions asked. Even though they had a fix in the works! I love both model headphones for working out and couldn’t be more pleased with Anker.
customer_reviews.author: D J

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds!
customer_reviews.text: Exceeded all my expectations. Powerful sound, nice bass, no distortion. Super easy pairing. They stay in place during running or work out. Not heavy nor uncomfortable, battery last long! Best thing is sweat never comes in so there is no wet nuisance sound at all. Can’t beat quality for this price. I had sennheiser sports and mpow, these beats them totally, such a great buy, Anker never disappoints at all.
customer_reviews.author: Giovas

customer_reviews.title: Battery life was a concern
customer_reviews.text: The sound profile for the headphones was decent but the main concern I had was battery life. It didn’t even last 3hrs even when the headphones were not in use. After a full charge I will use it in the morning for around an hour then turn it off. In the evening when I try the headphone is running low on battery. Probably I received a bad batch and so returned it.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great but...**update august 2019**
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are great for the gym. Pros: pair easy with my iphone stays in your ear with the hook design clickable buttons great battery life (improved by a lot) cheap and great secondary headphones only con: I have AirPods but they don't stay in ear at the gym, so I got these. AirPods not only sound better but are louder too so that surprised me. (luckily I listen to a bunch of podcasts now so I don't mind, but music takes a hit)
customer_reviews.author: cmisi

customer_reviews.title: Read update, amazing headphones
customer_reviews.text: Update! They died after a month, Anker replaced them, the new unit has better sound quality and longer battery life, I think I must have received a defective pair the first time, now I'm in love with these ones! Great build, best noise isolation ever, allows you to play with lower volume and still hear all the details of the song, really good mic. The audio quality is not better than the Mpow Flame, but those aren't as good as these for biking as these ones isolate the wind noise muuuch better. You will need to equalize your device to make them sound well, but the range from bass to trebble is good.
customer_reviews.author: JOSE EMANUEL GAZZANO SENDRA

customer_reviews.title: No pleased. Hoped for more.
customer_reviews.text: I wish I could like these headphones. Several problems since day one: 1.) I tried all of the ear adapters and couldn’t get the headphones to stay in my ears while running. 2.) The volume is too low. I had to turn the EQ off on my phone to hear the music during a run. I don’t need to do that with other headphones. 3.) BIGGEST PROBLEM: they died after a few weeks. I keep charging them and the charging light turns on and they appear to charge. However, when I put them on to use they are out of power.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Dude

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Money
customer_reviews.text: I went from using Jaybird X3s to using these. The sound is not quite as good as the Jaybirds, but they are also a fraction of the price. The build quality is really good for the price point. They definitely dont feel cheap. They are comfortable, they come with a hard case, and the battery life is amazing. As someone who uses headphones for 8-12 hours a day these definitely last the full day. If you are looking for a good pair of headphones without paying the name brand price, I would definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Huitt

customer_reviews.title: Updated Review- Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Update-I was contacted by customer service after posting that my Headphones stopped working. They were great and have sent me a new pair. Although I was disappointed that my first pair gave out, I'm happy that I get a chance to give them another try. Thanks Anker. Disappointed. I bought these in early October. I use them about 2 times a week. I’m not hard on them. Yesterday they died in the middle of a hike. They just stopped working. They will not charge. They won’t turn on.....nothing. They were good while they lasted but they didn’t last long at all. I rely on music during my hikes and workouts. To have the earbuds die in the middle is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: scarrillo3

customer_reviews.title: This my second purchase of this product.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Comfortable for daily use. Gives great sound quality and noise cancellation. I use them for my workouts in the gym, my running outdoors and normal everyday use. They give no problems in sunny or rainy weather and have surprisingly long battery life. They come off the charge around 3am and carry me through my day until am ready for bed around 10 - 11pm with still large battery power left
customer_reviews.author: Joe S

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Quality for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for two and a half months, and I just can't find a single negative with them. I use them every day outside in the elements for at least 2-3 hours. The sound quality is great, and they're a comfortable fit. If I HAD to come up with something it's that the control panel with the buttons is a little heavy and pulls down more than I'd like. But with all the money I've thrown away on trying to find a reliable pair of Bluetooth earbuds, I'm more than willing to put up with it. Buy these. You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent budget bluetooth headphones
customer_reviews.text: I mostly listen to talk radio, so sound quality isn't a big deal to me. For my purposes, they sound great and get plenty loud enough. Pairing with other devices was really easy and I haven't had any issues. It actually has really good range and I go outside my office and down the hall a good ways at work before they start to cut out. I'm very happy with them so far and would recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: |J|

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and battery life are fine. That's not my complaint. About six months after purchase the left speaker quit working. Anker replaced them under warranty and about six months later the left speaker on the replacement set also went out. I typically like Anker products, but this seems like a major QC problem they just don't have under control. Now I'm in the market for yet another pair of Bluetooth headphones.
customer_reviews.author: A. Tikkanen

customer_reviews.title: Still in love 1.5 years later
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I keep one earbud out at work so I can hear anything important going on (like work gossip LOL). I use these while lifting in the gym. It came with multiple earbud sizes, but the ones that are most comfortable are a little loose for running. Even then, the ear holder keeps them closer so a quick adjustment to push them back in is all you need. After a year and a half I managed to poke holes going into the earbuds (after trying to clean them) but it hasn't changed the sound quality or anything. Better sound quality than the corded apple earbuds. I will stay with Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

product_meta.title: [Upgraded] Anker Soundbuds Curve Wireless Headphones, 18H Battery, IPX7 Waterproof Bluetooth Headphones, Bluetooth 5.0, Built in Mic and Carry Pouch, SweatGuard Technology for Workout, Gym, Running
product_meta.description:
Hardcore SweatGuard Protection and Big Beats
SoundBuds Curve Bluetooth earbuds combine deep, powerful bass with seriously strong waterproof protection and a secure fit to ensure nothing stops you from reaching your workout goals. 

Key Features
10 mm Composite Drivers: Effortlessly produce rich sound with thumping bass. 
Exclusive BassUp Technology: Conducts real-time analysis of the low frequencies to instantly strengthen the bass output by up to 43%. 
Hardcore Listening: Get 18 hours of playtime at 80% volume from a single charge. 
IPX7 Waterproof: SoundBuds Curve are defended by a fully-waterproof casing which can be submerged for up to 30 minutes in up to 1 m of water. 
Secure and Comfortable Fit: The Bluetooth earbuds are ergonomically designed and come with EarTips and EarWings in various sizes to tailor the fit to you. 
Fast Charge: When you’re in a rush, a 10-minute charge will provide you with up to 3 hours of continuous playtime. 
Hands-Free Calls: The built-in microphone on the remote Bluetooth earbuds gives you instant control of your music and calls even when you’re mid-session. 

Specifications

What’s In The Box
SoundBuds Curve

feature_bullets: Rich treble and thumping bass: sound Buds Curve Bluetooth earbuds are powered by 10 mm composite drivers. The ultra-elastic outer ring produces deep bass and a lightweight and flexible composite Bio-cellulose dome delivers midst and highs with enhanced clarity.

Up to 43% more bass: our exclusive BASSUP technology conducts real-time analysis of low frequencies to instantly strengthen the Bass output. Feel the bass as it surges through your body and pumps You up for the workout ahead.

Hardcore playtime: 18 hours of listening (at 80% volume) gives you the power and motivation needed to fuel over two weeks of workouts. When you’re in a rush, a 10-minute charge will provide you with up to 3 hours of continuous playtime.

IPX7 Waterproof: Sound Buds Curve Bluetooth earbuds are defended by a fully waterproof casing that’s based on a submarine’s structure. Push yourself during your workout without fear of sweat and rain damaging your earphones. You can even rinse them with water when cleaning.
Secure and comfortable fit: The Bluetooth earbuds are ergonomically designed and come with ear tips and ear wings in various sizes to tailor the fit to you.
